page.title: 06Durweston School:Our Homes 2
page.content: { Kitchens Every body had 1 kitchen which we expected. There wouldn't be 2 kitchens because you only need 1 in which to cook meals. {Dining Rooms 5 people haven't got any dining rooms at all but there are 15 people with dining rooms. So most people have a dining room. {Lounges We expected that each house would only have 1 lounge, but we had 1 house with 2. So that means that most houses only have 1 lounge. {Bedrooms There are 2 people who have got 4 bedrooms, 12 people have 3, and 6 people have 2. Therefore most people have 3 bedrooms in their houses.
